metadata.creator: Asuka Ohta & Ryo Nagamatsu
metadata.description:
One of the exchangeable items for 2011 Club Nintendo platinum members in Japan.  Delivered in December.  

Music by Asuka Ohta and Ryo Nagamatsu  

Tracks 1~4: Menu Tracks 5~20: Courses Tracks 21~25, 31~36: Results Tracks 26~30: Battle Arenas Tracks 37~40: Mario Kart Channel/Wi-Fi Track 41: Award Ceremony (Full Version) Tracks 42 & 43: Staff Credits 
All 43 pieces of art were written by Asuka Ohta and Ryo Nagamatsu, two Japanese composers.
metadata.subject: Asuka Ohta & Ryo Nagamatsu
